notes_text: In December 2023, Parliament adopted a bill to legalize medical cannabis on second reading. It was signed into law by President Zelensky on 15 February 2024.
notes: In December 2023, Parliament adopted a bill to legalize medical cannabis on second reading. It was signed into law by President Zelensky on 15 February 2024.
notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in Ukraine}} In December 2023, Parliament adopted a bill to legalize medical cannabis on second reading.<ref>{{Cite news |last=Hilsman |first=Patrick |date=2023-07-13 |title=Ukrainian legislature passes medical marijuana law |url=https://www.upi.com/Top_News/World-News/2023/12/21/ukraine-Ukraine-medical-marijuana/2351703169298/ |access-date=2023-12-21 |publisher=[[United Press International]] |language=en-US}}</ref> It was signed into law by President Zelensky on 15 February 2024.<ref>{{cite news|title= Ukraine legalises cannabis for medical use|work=Reuters|date=15 February 2024 |url= https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-legalises-cannabis-medical-use-2024-02-15/}}</ref>
